ITEM1-1.caption: rxMode emuNAND
ITEM1-1.description: Apply patches and reboot the console into rxMode on emuNand, if present.

ITEM1-2.caption: rxMode sysNAND
ITEM1-2.description: Apply patches and reboot the console into rxMode on sysNand.

ITEM1-3.caption: PastaMode
ITEM1-3.description: Patches signature checks and load in sysNAND with GBA and DSi support.

ITEM2-1.caption: Decrypt CTR Titles
ITEM2-1.description: Decrypt 3DS titles directly on the console.

ITEM2-2.caption: Decrypt Title Keys
ITEM2-2.description: Decrypt title keys stored in tickets.db which is needed to decrypt CDN content.

ITEM2-3.caption: Decrypt encTitleKeys.bin
ITEM2-3.description: Decrypt the private key of a game.

ITEM2-4.caption: Generate Xorpads
ITEM2-4.description: Generate XORpads needed to decrypt and encrypt 3DS titles.

ITEM2-5.caption: Decrypt partitions
ITEM2-5.description: Dump and decrypt all sysNAND or emuNAND partitions (except the TWL partition for now).

ITEM2-6.caption: Generate fat16 Xorpad
ITEM2-6.description: Generate XORpad needed to decrypt main NAND partition.

ITEM3-1.caption: Create NAND dump
ITEM3-1.description: Backup your sysNAND or emuNAND partition. It is highly recommended to backup your sysNAND partition.

ITEM3-3.caption: Dump NAND Files
ITEM3-3.description: Dump various important files from sysNAND or emuNAND.

ITEM4-1.caption: Inject emuNAND partitions
ITEM4-1.description: Encrypt and write partitions from files on SD card into emuNAND (except the TWL partition for now).

ITEM4-2.caption: Inject NAND Files
ITEM4-2.description: Inject various important files from SD card into sysNAND or emuNAND.

ITEM5-1.caption: Downgrade MSET on SysNAND
ITEM5-1.description: Install old MSET in sysNAND to be able to use the DS profile exploit on firmwares 5.x-9.2.

ITEM5-2.caption: Install FBI over H&S App
ITEM5-2.description: Install FBI (a legal .cia installed) over Health&Safety application in sysNAND.

ITEM5-3.caption: Restore original H&S App
ITEM5-3.description: Uninstall FBI .cia installer and restore the original Health&Safety application.

ITEM5-4.caption: Advanced File Manager
ITEM5-4.description: Choose a firmare file on SD card and load it.
